discourse_list.title: I propose a standard that allows for a holding wallet address and a named owner

content.content: I propose a standard that allows for a holding wallet address and a named owner. This way an NFT could be held in trust, escrow or left in a will for the intended owner. I’m looking for someone to help me author this new standard if anyone is interested.
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes a new standard that allows for a holding wallet address and a named owner for NFTs. The proposal aims to enable NFTs to be held in trust, escrow, or left in a will for the intended owner. The author is seeking someone to help author the new standard and is open to constructive criticism and collaboration.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
